Hi,

I had been crawling regularly few sites using H3-beta and I was able =
to crawl them satisfactorily in all my attempts.
With H-3.0 final release (=
dec 11) version, with the 'exactly' same crawler-beans settings as used wit=
h H3-beta, I am unable to crawl those sites now. 
I am noticing that the 'd=
iscovered or queued URIs'=A0 doesn't grow beyond 1k or so and crawl finishe=
s within few minutes. With beta, I could see millions of URIs discovered an=
d crawl with exactly the same settings.
I am not a heritrix developer. Peop=
le who worked on the beta and the final release: any clue what (modules) un=
derwent changes that possibly could affect the uri discovery?

Thanks!
Pran=
ay
